title: Bought 10€ worth of RP, but didn't get it.
body: Well, basically what i said in the title, this just happened, my bank account did get charged but I didn't get the RP {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Porocles I had the same problem 2-3 years ago,and paysafe told me that the money has joined in riot games but i didnt get the rp and i was very bad cause i lost 10 euros in a game and i didnt get back the rp

Follow their post and submit a request.

Direct link to Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


* Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**


* For the tertiary category select **RP Purchase Errors.**

They may be able to track this, but I'm not sure due to the time passed.

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Debonair-Ezreal.jpg

Our billing team can help with this!  Please reach out to us in a[ player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look into this for you.  Due to the nature of account sensitive info, we'd prefer not to discuss it on the boards.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
Try logging off them back on.
